word:
What is the value of money at this time, in comparison with the value of souls? Every dollar of our means should be considered as the Lord's, not ours; and as a precious trust from God to us; not to be wasted for needless indulgences, 
                                                                           221
but carefully used in the cause of God, in the work of saving men and women from ruin.--Life Sketches of Ellen G. White, p. 214.
